qas.question: What meeting did Napoleon and Czar Alexander participate in in 1808?
In what year did the Congress of Erfurt take place?
Where did Napoleon and Czar Alexander first meet?
In what year did Napoleon and Czar Alexander first meet?
Violations of what Napoleonic policy by Russia led to tensions between Russia and France?

context: In <a1_0>1808<a1_0/>, Napoleon and Czar Alexander met at <a0_0>the Congress of Erfurt<a0_0/> to preserve the Russo-French alliance. The leaders had a friendly personal relationship after their first meeting at <a2_0>Tilsit<a2_0/> in <a3_0>1807<a3_0/>. By 1811, however, tensions had increased and Alexander was under pressure from the Russian nobility to break off the alliance. A major strain on the relationship between the two nations became the regular violations of <a4_0>the Continental System<a4_0/> by the Russians, which led Napoleon to threaten Alexander with serious consequences if he formed an alliance with Britain.
